headline: Salesforce (CRM) Is Up 11.5% After AI Partnerships, Guidance Hike And Buybacks Completion - Has The Bull Case Changed?
summary: In the past week, Salesforce reported third-quarter fiscal 2026 results with revenue of US$10,259 million and net income of US$2,086 million, raised its full-year guidance, expanded its Agentforce AI platform through new partnerships such as AstraZeneca, completed a multi-year buyback program, and its board declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.416 per share payable on January 8, 2026. Together, the rapid growth of Agentforce and Data Cloud, high-profile AI deployments across sectors like...
